resources.string: Are you sure you want to log out?
Disabling this feature may result in poor audio quality.\n\nAre you sure you want to disable G.729 Audio?
The number you selected is already in use on the following account:

Simply put, VoX Mobile is about saving money when you use your mobile phone. This means that you can call anyone in the US, Canada, and Puerto Rico from anywhere in the world and you'll also get a real telephone number so people can call you.

International customers can also use VoX Mobile to call the US, Canada, and Puerto Rico for free with select service plans.

You also get free unlimited text messaging to other VoX Mobile customers.

We offer service plans to fit any budget. All of our service plans are contract-free so you don't have to worry about being locked in to a commitment. You'll also get premium calling features such as caller ID, call waiting, and voice mail for free.

You can browse our service plans on the following screen to find the one that fits your needs. Plan details and pricing are available by selecting any service plan.

Click 'continue' to get started.
A newer version of this application is available in the Android Market. Please upgrade your application.
What country do you live in?
Email addresses do not match.\n\nVerify your email address and try again.
Invalid credit card number.\n\nVerify your credit card number and try again.
Invalid credit card security code.\n\nVerify your credit card CVV and try again.
Missing credit card month.\n\nVerify your credit card expiration month and try again.
Invalid billing street.\n\nPlease enter the street address where you receive credit card statements and try again.
Invalid billing city.\n\nPlease enter the street address where you receive credit card statements and try again.
Invalid billing postal code.\n\nPlease enter the street address where you receive credit card statements and try again.
On the next screen you will need to select a location from which your new phone number will be will be chosen.\n\nFor example, if you want a phone number from Los Angeles, then select that location.
Please review the information below. Click \'cancel\' to make changes or \'continue\' to finish your order.
Please verify the information and try again.
Your first name is missing or invalid.
Your last name is missing or invalid.
Your email address is missing or invalid.
Your credit card billing street is missing or invalid.
Your credit card billing city is missing or invalid.
Your credit card billing postal code is missing or invalid.
Your credit card billing country is missing or invalid.
Your credit card number is invalid.
Your credit card expiration month is invalid.
Your credit card expiration year is invalid.
Your credit card security code (CVV) is invalid.
Your credit card has been declined.
This device has exceeded the maximum number of free accounts.\n\nContact support@voxcorp.net if you need more information.

We have received your order and are processing it. You will receive several emails shortly with important account information. Once we have processed your order you will be able to setup your phone and start calling. In the meantime, please remember the account information shown below as it is needed to access your account.
Your credit card has been charged

Your account is currently being created. This typically takes less than 5 minutes.

Your phone will be configured automatically after your account setup is complete.

You can safely close this screen if you do not want to wait for this process to finish.
